com.example.projectbored

Class EventClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.projectbored.EventClass

  • public class EventClass
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of the events that the users can add, modify and delete.
    Since:
    2020-04-01

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventClass

        public EventClass(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String mapsData,
                  boolean showMap,
                  boolean isGroup,
                  Location location,
                  Price price)
        A simple constructor for EventClass
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the event
        mapsData - The data that will be sent to the Google Maps app to search for a certain event
        showMap - A boolean flag that shows if the show in map button should be shown in the popup
        isGroup - A boolean that shows if an event is considered a group event or not
        location - The location of the event, that can either be indoors or outdoors
        price - The price of the event, that can either be free or paid
